thread.title_full: Heat's Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures

author: Monster storm makes landfall as category 5 in Mexico
title: Heat's Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures
text:
Heat's Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures Associated Press 16 hrs ago Â© AP Photo/Alan Diaz Miami Heat guard Gerald Green (14) celebrates after scoring against the Washington Wizards in the second half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Miami. NEW YORK (AP) Miami Heat guard Gerald Green was fined $25,000 by the NBA on Friday for making menacing gestures in an exhibition game.
AdChoices The incidents occurred with 5:33 and 5:12 left in Miami's 110-105 victory over Washington on Wednesday night. Green scored 28 points in the game.
